name: Joe Sample
description: Joe is a simple guy, trying to be a good man in a hard world.

aspects.name: Protagonist for Pay
aspects.description: Joe is an ex-cop who now works as a Private Investigator and is definitely the hero of his own story.

aspects.name: Too good for this world
aspects.description: Joe will do the right thing even though it turns out very badly for him.

aspects.name: Must reconnect with my estranged daughter Emily
aspects.description: Joe's adult daughter Emily lives in the City but does not want contact with her father. She was raised by her mother after she divorced Joe because of his extreme work ethic and for fear of losing him to the dangers of his job.

aspects.name: Carla's the best partner a man can have.

stunts.name: Resolute
stunts.description: In order to steel myself to action, I get +2 to a Will roll to Create an Advantage representing my decision to follow through on that action. The Aspect created can be used to resist efforts to stop me completing the action.
